remarks: The size of the universe is a binomial coefficient.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Nov-2016.)
statement:

ballotth.o $e |- O = { c e. ~P ( 1 ... ( M + N ) ) | ( # ` c ) = M } $.
